text: Spoiwo is a musical group created in 2009 in Gdańsk, Poland. Until the end of 2018, the band had five members. In 2019, two of the members left the band (Simona Jambor and Paweł Bereszczyński), and instead they were joined by Patryk Piątkowski. On 13 March 2015, Spoiwo released their debut album Salute Solitude, consisting of 7 songs. They played at many post-rock festivals, including Dunk!Festival, Whoneedslyrics?! festival, and various Polish festivals, such as OFF Festival and Expect Delays Fest. They have shared the stage with bands like God is an Astronaut, Maybeshewill, Explosions in the Sky, Sleepmakeswaves, and many more. ==Band members== Current members # Piotr Gierzyński # Patryk Piątkowski (since 2019) # Krzysztof Zaczyński # Krzysztof Sarnek Past members # Paweł Bereszczyński (2009–2018) # Simona Jambor (2010–2018) ==Nominations== * Discovery of the Year for "Pomeranian Storms"http://trojmiasto.wyborcza.pl/trojmiasto/1,35635,19550698,pomorskie- sztormy-2015-czas-na-glosowanie.html * Best band of 2015 for Arctic Droneshttp://arcticdrones.com/staff-picks/10-best-new-bands-post-rock/ * 11th best post-rock album of 2015 for Arctic Droneshttp://arcticdrones.com/staff- picks/50-best-albums-2015-post-rock/ * Best post-rock album of 2015 by postrockerNLhttp://www.postrocker.nl/2015/12/2015-year-in-postrock-review.html * Best debut of 2015 and best Polish post-rock album of 2015 by Post-Rock Plhttps://www.facebook.com/PostrockPL/posts/1324125124279850?__xts__ * Top 10 best Polish albums of 2015 by Music Ishttp://musicis.pl/2015/12/21/najlepsze- polskie-albumy-2015-roku-wedlug-redakcji-musicis-pl/ * Top 20 most interesting Polish albums of 2015 by Uwolnij Muzykęhttps://uwolnijmuzyke.pl/artykuly/najciekawsze-albumy- polskie-2015-roku?rq=najlepsze%20polskie%20p%C5%82yty * Pomeranian Music Award DOKI 2015 - nominations in the categories Album of the Year, Artist of the Year, and New Face; won in New Face categoryhttp://musicis.pl/2016/02/08/doki-2015-rozdane/ * Best concert band by Pomeranian Music Award DOKI 2016https://www.gdansk.pl/wiadomosci/nowa-nagroda- muzyczna-w-trojmiescie-doki-2016-przyznane,a,48639 ==References== ==External links== * https://www.facebook.com/Spoiwo/ * https://spoiwo.bandcamp.com/ Category:Polish rock music groups Category:Post-rock groups
title: Spoiwo
